short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you better find and navigate through Chrome pages by offering a better, cleaner and smarter menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Shortcuts is a new extension that allows you to easily access most important chrome pages without loosing much time to find a specific page.

Chrome Shortcuts main Chrome pages are:

 • History
 • Clear Browser Data
 • Extensions
 • Settings
 • Downloads
 • Bookmarks
 • Apps (new)
 • Chrome Web Store

Chrome Shortcuts also includes almost all the other Chrome pages which can be found in Advanced and All pages.

For questions, reports, feedback, support or anything related to Chrome Shortcuts contact us at hidev.chrome@gmail.com
